nodes.text: A helmet was a component of armor worn on an individual's head. The Mandalorian super commandos sometimes decorated their helmets with horns. Clone troopers wore helmets as part of their armor, and occasionally referred to them as sun bonnets.
Wookiee helmets contained a crest of an ancient sun symbol, and Wookiee hair could be threaded through its perforated flange.
Helmets were standard equipment in grav-ball and often got dirty.
